hero.name: I'M Nebiyu
hero.text: Hello, Im Web Developer and aspiring Ui/Ux Designer that specializes in React and Django

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website v2
projects.description: A modern portfolio website built with React and Vite.
details: Tech Stack: React, Vite, CSS, JavaScript
Features: Responsive design, multi language support, implemented light and dark mode support,used formik and yup for validation used Email Js for submition, Deployed to Vercel

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website v1
projects.description: A modern portfolio website built with React and Vite.
details: Tech Stack: React, Vite, CSS, JavaScript
Features: Responsive design, Implemented Interactive Skills Slider,used formik and yup for validation used Email Js for submition, Deployed to Vercel

projects.name: Telegram Bot Development (Django)
projects.description: A Telegram group control and payment bot built with django with payment integration.
details: Tech Stack: Django, Mongo DB, Chapa, python, Telegram API

Features: Implemented a Telegram Group Bot for Tigat website using Django that has group restrictions and rules for keeping Community Guidelines, payment integration with Chapa's Api for Community payment, Implemented Web app in telegram for the user fetching html/css/js from our django server for succesful payement interface, Implemented the test clases for the classes

qa.question: What was your primary role at Conquer Agency(Tigat Website)?
qa.answer: I served as a Back-End Django Developer, robust , scalable and efficient backend system for group management and community payment.

qa.question: What technologies did you use?
qa.answer: I primarily used Django, Python, with Mongodb for database storage.

qa.question: What were your key responsibilities?
qa.answer: I implemented python classes that merged with telegram's api, created group guideline rules, integrated with chapa for payment, wrote pytest test classes

qa.question: What was a major achievement?
qa.answer: I successfully collabrated with a team and developed something that will be used by the public.

qa.question: What was your role at DAF ICT?
qa.answer: I worked as a Full-Stack Developer, collabrating and building goverment projects.

qa.question: What technologies were involved?
qa.answer: I used React, Angular, TypeScript, SQL, and .NET Core for API development.

qa.question: What tasks did you handle?
qa.answer: I integrated front-end with backend services, created a single product website using react, collabrated on turning legacy water billing system into modern web apps.

qa.question: What was a key accomplishment?
qa.answer: Developing the website for first smart water meter product launch
